## Q4

Tibbles do not coerce down to a vector when you subset to only one column using \[. Tibbles are also easier to use with chain operators.

## Q5

Write as

"as_tibble(iris) \|\>

select(starts_with("Petal"), Species) \|\>

filter(Petal.Length \< 1.55) \|\>

arrange(Species)"
